projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive library management system built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time book tracking, user management, and automated notifications.
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time updates across multiple user sessions while maintaining data consistency.

projects.title: Newsly Pro - Modern News Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive news aggregation platform built with React that delivers trending articles, advanced filtering, premium subscription content, and a seamless user experience.
features: Trending Articles Slider with real-time view tracking
Advanced Article Management with CRUD and admin approval
Premium Subscription System with automatic expiration
Smart Search & Filtering with real-time results
Responsive Design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Real-time Statistics with animated counters and charts
projects.challenges: Synchronizing real-time article updates, subscription handling, and user role permissions while ensuring secure data communication.

projects.title: Recipe Sharing Platform
projects.description: A social platform for food enthusiasts to share, discover, and rate recipes with interactive cooking features and meal planning tools.
projects.challenges: Building a complex recipe editor with image uploads and ingredient management while ensuring optimal performance.
